slogan: The low-code platform for learning game development.

feature1.title: Learn the basics
feature1.description: Learn the basics of game development with the easy language SproutScript.

feature2.title: Create your dream game
feature2.description: Create your dream game using the inbuilt features.

feature3.title: The future looks bright
feature3.description: SproutScript is a language that is easy to learn as well as similar to other languages. So nothing is stopping you from exploring the world of programming as a whole.
